response.original_title: How Do I Recover My Uphold Account? {US Users}
response.overview: Go to the Uphold login page, select “Forgot Password,” (1 888 574  7167)and follow reset instructions sent to your registered email. Ensure you use your verified email linked to your US account (1 888 574 7167).
response.title: How Do I Recover My Uphold Account? {US Users}
